text: TUNE IN: As the #vaccine rollout starts in the U.S. this week, is the end of the #COVID19 pandemic in sight? Health fellow @PeterHotez joined the #PolicyMatters Podcast to answer this question and to discuss the rise of anti-vaccine sentiment. Listen here: https://t.co/S1AuLMAvQQ https://t.co/CsI0QlDWji
